ValidationRule.description: Ensures that the advice has a complete or skipped fact find prior to progressing advice.
ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula: !$Setup.SystemConfiguration__c.ValidationBypass__c && NOT(ISBLANK( OW_review__c )) && (ISPICKVAL(Advice_Status__c, "Ready for suitability") || ISPICKVAL(Advice_Status__c, "Suitability in progress") || ISPICKVAL(Advice_Status__c, "Deck complete")) && (NOT(ISPICKVAL( OW_review__r.OW_review_fact_find_status__c, "Skipped" ) || ISPICKVAL( OW_review__r.OW_review_fact_find_status__c, "Complete" )))
ValidationRule.errorMessage: The annual review fact find must be marked as complete or skipped prior to progressing the advice.
